titleStmt.title: The last, and now only, compleat collection, of the newest and choisest songs and poems, that are now extant both at courts theatres and elsewhere with above forty new songs never before in print, which are now added to this second part of Westminster drollery.
Westminster drollery.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Will. Gilbert ..., and Tho. Sawbridge ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
